about.meta.title: About — Mari Rodrigues Photography
about.hero.title: I’m Marina.
about.hero.subtitle: I tell stories of people and places through cinematic photography.
about.story.text: I love creating memories through my lens. My work focuses on meaningful experiences and timeless moments — especially in Barcelona, a city where art lives in every corner and ordinary moments become unforgettable.
about.closing.title: Let’s create something meaningful together.
about.closing.text: If my work resonates with you, I’d love to hear your story.

about.section.subtitle: Hey, thrill seeker.
about.section.paragraph1: I’m MR — a photographer drawn to golden shadows, quiet romance, and honest emotion.
about.section.paragraph2: Think cinema stills, but for your real life. If you want images that feel like a story you can step back into, you’re in the right place.
